channel.title: 🏢 the Chinese University of Hong Kong on NeurIPS 2024
channel.description: Recent content in 🏢 the Chinese University of Hong Kong on NeurIPS 2024

item.title: Decoupled Kullback-Leibler Divergence Loss
item.description: Improved Kullback-Leibler (IKL) divergence loss achieves state-of-the-art adversarial robustness and competitive knowledge distillation performance by addressing KL loss’s limitations.
